meanings.definition: A musical instrument consisting of a long wooden tube that produces a deep, droning sound when blown into.
meanings.sent1: The didjeridoos were played at the concert, filling the air with their unique sound.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of musicians carrying didjeridoos on their way to the performance.
meanings.sent3: The didjeridoos decided to have a jam session in the forest, much to the surprise of the animals.
meanings.sent4: The didjeridoos echoed through the valley, creating a mystical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the didjeridoos resonated in my soul, leaving me mesmerized.
